newsitem.title: UK: UK delivered grain trades - June 27.
newsitem.headline: UK delivered grain trades - June 27.

text.p: UK grain brokers reported the following delivered grain trades at 1500 GMT, in Sterling a tonne.

Feed Wheat to West Norfolk spot 83.50, Norfolk/Suffolk July 84.25, 84.50, 85.00, october-December 89.50, Avon July 84.00, Liverpool August 88.00, Bedfordshire, Buckinghamshire, Northamptonshire, Oxfordshire (BBNO) July 84.00, Cheshire/Shropshire 85.50.
Feed Barley Yorkshire spot 81.00, Avon as available 79.50, 80.00
